ygData.subject: Unhandled exception while running Heritrix
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, I have been running Heritrix for some time and recently I got this strange exception while launching a job. The details from the job.log are as follows:

Hello,

     I have been running Heritrix for some time and recently I got =
this strange exception while launching a job. The details from the job.log =
are as follows:


2010-05-18T15:43:47.929Z SEVERE Unhandled exception or er=
ror intercepted
2010-05-18T15:43:47.993Z INFO Job instance discarded
2010-0=
5-18T15:43:48.364Z INFO Job instantiated
2010-05-18T15:43:48.452Z INFO Job =
launched
2010-05-18T15:43:48.576Z SEVERE RuntimeException: com.sleepycat.je=
.EnvironmentFailureException: (JE 4.0.71) Environment must be closed, cause=
d by: com.sleepycat.je.EnvironmentFailureException: Environment invalid bec=
ause of previous exception: (JE 4.0.71) /root/test_job/state com.sleepycat.=
je.log.ChecksumException: Read invalid log entry type: 99 LOG_CHECKSUM: Che=
cksum invalid on read, log is likely invalid. Environment is invalid and mu=
st be closed. fetchTarget of 0x0/0x40904a parent IN=3D13 IN class=3Dcom.sle=
epycat.je.tree.BIN lastFullVersion=3D0x2/0xb1fb2 parent.getDirty()=3Dfalse =
state=3D0 (in thread 'test_job launchthread')
2010-05-18T15:43:50.051Z SEVE=
RE Unhandled exception or error intercepted


Can someone please shed some =
light on the error and what I would need to do to avoid this in the future.=


Thanks,
Sriram.
